Nameless area: Village Head's treasure

In the bedroom of the Nameless villageVillage leader's house, there is a <color=#c44b0e>large pottery jar</color> with a secret chamber underneath. It is said that the coiled dragon chest inside holds the treasure that the Village Head has been guarding for many years.
Descendant of the Yang family
Someone once saw a person in <color=#c44b0e>Chuxiang City</color> who looked very much like General Yang when he was young. It could be a descendant of the Yang family.
Pear Blossom Manual
column3: เคล็ดวิชาหลีฮวา

Nameless area: The <color=#c44b0e>Pear Blossom Manual</color> of the Revered is kept by the descendants of the Yang family, but the whereabouts of the descendants are still unknown.
column3: <color=#c44b0e>เคล็ดวิชาหลีฮวา</color> อันโด่งดังได้ถูกรักษาไว้โดยทายาทแห่งตระกูลหยาง, แต่ไม่มีใครทราบว่าพวกเขาอยู่ที่ใด

Nameless area: Yang Yao Er informed that the <color=#c44b0e>Pear Blossom Spear Manual</color> is hidden in a cave in a Ruined shrine.
column3: หยางเหยาเอ๋อแจ้งว่า<color=#c44b0e>เคล็ดวิชาหอกหลีฮวา</color> ซ่อนอยู่ในถ้ำภายในศาลเจ้าร้าง

Nameless area: Pear Blossom
It is rumored that the Yang family's <color=#c44b0e>Pear Blossom</color> is hidden in the deepest part of the Wild Wolf Valley, and it seems not easy to obtain.
column3: มีข่าวลือว่า<color=#c44b0e>หอกหลีฮวา</color>ของตระกูลหยาง ซ่อนอยู่ในจุดที่ลึกสุดของหุบเขาหมาป่า และดูเหมือนว่าจะไม่สามารถหามันได้ง่ายๆ

Nameless area: Xiao Bao's Secret
Under a pink-leafed tree in the Lost Forest, a large Lingzhi grows.
The Friendship of the Landlady
If the innkeeper's wife considers you <color=#c44b0e>Intimate</color>, you can stay at the village inn for <color=#c44b0e>free</color>.
Ruined shrine
column3: ศาลเจ้าร้าง

Nameless area: It is said that the wall of the Ruined shrine outside the village will display text at night.
Village Hunter
column3: หมู่บ้านนักล่า

Nameless area: It is said that Hunter Liu Shiba learned the ability to speak to animals from the disciples of the Beast Mountain Villa. Pay more attention to the news of the Beast Mountain Villa in the future, and you may have the opportunity to learn the animal language.
Human Sentiments
Giving others a <color=#097a76>Gift</color> can not only improve Relations, but also gain their trust and receive task commissions.
Lost Forest Treasure
column3: สมบัติป่าสาปสูญ

Nameless area: There seems to be a treasure buried in the Lost Forest, but where exactly is it... It would be great if a Treasure map could be found.
West Pass
To pass through West Pass smoothly, you need to get the hand orders from Kang Wang and Qi Wang.
Lin'an City
Seven-day Heartbreak Gu

The Seven-Day Heartbreak Gu poison is as its name suggests. If the Poisoned person cannot Detoxify within <color=#c44b0e>seven days</color>, they will die of poison. The well in Lin'an City has also been poisoned with this kind of poison. If it cannot be resolved...

You can <color=#c44b0e>Trade</color> with Miao Caidie in Lin'an City to get the antidote for the Seven-Day Heartbreak Gu, or find a companion with <color=#c44b0e>Toxicology or Medical</color> skills reaching 50 to Detoxify.
Opportunity to Become a Disciple

It is said that the Buddhist monk of Shifa Temple is preaching in the <color=#c44b0e>Cloud Forest Temple</color>, and that Taoist Sect's La Tazhang may appear near the <color=#c44b0e>Wine God Tower</color>.
Suspicious Person
A middle-aged man with a <color=#c44b0e>knife wound on his leg</color> was encountered in the northwest direction of Lin'an City
Helping the bailiff in Lin'an City to arrest the man with a knife wound can earn a bounty of 10 guan.
Underground Arena
There is an underground Arena in Lin'an City, where beasts are occasionally released to fight with people, which is very exciting.
The Underground Arena in Lin'an City is the Lin'an branch of the Black Robe Group. To enter, you need to answer the correct password.
The password for the entrance of the Underground Arena in Lin'an City is "A moment in spring is worth a thousand gold, money can't buy happiness".
The Underground Arena in Lin'an City opens once every five days, and each contestant can only compete on stage once a day.

With the decline of talents in the martial arts world, the number of people participating in the Lin'an CityUnderground Arena competition is dwindling. The Underground Arena has announced its permanent closure, and the legend of the Underground Arena has become a thing of the past.
Enlighten Tower
The Lin'an CityEnlighten Tower is hosting an Arena treasure hunt, where the winner can obtain a priceless treasure and the opportunity to serve in the Imperial City.
Miao Caidie
First met Miao Caidie in Lin'an City, unfortunately, time is short, Miao Caidie has to return to the Jiuli Tribe in three days.
Major Events in the Martial Arts World
Yan Army Invades the South
According to secret reports, the Yan army intends to invade the south, and Chuxiang City may be under siege soon.
Twelve Animal Rings

The Twelve Animal Rings, derived from the twelve zodiac animal forms, are named after the twenty-eight constellations. There is a great secret hidden in the Animal Rings, and only by gathering the scattered Animal Rings can one have a chance to uncover it.
Chuxiang City
column3: เมืองฉู่เซียง

Nameless area: Luminous cup
It is said that the precious treasure <color=#c44b0e>Luminous Cup</color> is in the hands of Jiang Nanguai on Dirty Street.
Battle of Chuxiang City
Shifa Temple has sent disciples to reinforce Chuxiang City!
Taoist Sect has sent disciples to reinforce Chuxiang City!
Nine Factions Sect has sent disciples to reinforce Chuxiang City!
Melody House has sent disciples to reinforce Chuxiang City!
Kang Wang has sent troops to reinforce Chuxiang City!
Ye Pengju has sent troops to reinforce Chuxiang City!
Secret Passage Out of the City
Jiang Nanguai of Dirty Street has a secret passage to escape from Chuxiang City.
The entrance to the secret passage is under a wooden box deep in Dirty Street.
Hero Statue
The great sword on the statue is loose, it seems that it can be removed with some method.
General's mansion
The General's Mansion in Chuxiang City is recruiting talents. Anyone with skills will be valued, and it is said that many have risen to prominence through this.
Dirty Street Auction
Jiang Nanguai of Dirty Street in Chuxiang City holds an auction at Wu Shi every day, and it is said that a strange copper ring will be the mysterious auction item.
Chuxiang Ding family's house
The two flower pots in the Ding Family's Main Hall are the switches to the Ding Family's Secret Chamber.
Daliang City
The World's Number One Challenge
Someone in Daliang City has set up the <color=#c44b0e>World's Number One Challenge</color>, and heroes from all sides are ready to show their skills in the Arena and make a name for themselves.
Martial Arts Contest for a Bride
A big shot in Daliang City is holding a martial arts competition for marriage. You can sign up for the competition from Si Shi to You Shi every day.
Zhangyue Casino
The <color=#c44b0e>Zhangyue Casino</color> in Daliang City is a place to make money based on luck.
Martial Arts Rumors
Night Demon Square
Night Demon Square holds an auction at Zi Shi every day, with various materials as the main auction items.
County exam
{PlayerName} performed excellently in the local examination and won the position of "Jie Yuan".
Provincial exam
{PlayerName} won the first place in the imperial examination and won the position of "Hui Yuan".
Jianghu Master

To become a Jianghu Master, your Fame must reach <color=#097a76>Prominence</color>, and you must make the six major factions of Shifa Temple, Taoist Sect, Confucius Temple, Langya Sword Pavilion, Jiujiang Water Camp, and Crime Investigation Bureau submit to you. Finally, you must pass the challenge of the six faction leaders.
Jianghu Conqueror
column3: ผู้พิชิตยุทธภพ

Nameless area: To become a Jianghu Conqueror, you must <color=#c44b0e>eliminate</color> the six major sects: Shifa Temple, Taoist Sect, Confucius Temple, Langya Sword Pavilion, Jiujiang Water Camp, and Crime Investigation Bureau. When your Fame reaches <color=#c44b0e>Prominence</color>, gather the remaining forces of Jianghu and subdue them with martial force.
Big Devil
The unparalleled Big Devil is imprisoned in the Ice Prison under the stone tower in Lin'an CityCloud Forest Temple!
Imperial Examination

To become an Imperial Scholar, first go to Chuxiang City and pass the test of the old scholar in Dragon Library, then go to Chuxiang CityGovernment Office to take the preliminary examination and obtain the "Scholar" status. Then go to Daliang CityImperial School to pass the test of the school principal, and then to Daliang Government Office to take the provincial examination. If you perform well, you can obtain the "Imperial Scholar" status!
The Way to Wealth of Tomb Raider Sect
Get the rumor - The leader of Tomb Raider Sect, Ming Bufan, knows many ways to make money. If you want to get rich, you can ask him for advice.
Orchid Pavillion Preface

It is said that a profound Martial Arts is hidden in the Calligraphy "Orchid Pavillion Preface". Only those who are proficient in calligraphy and painting and have extremely high Intelligence can comprehend its mystery.
Infamous
The Sea Jiao Gang and Bandit Camp are in the Nameless area, and the Blue Wind Camp is in Xiangfan.
Imperial Seal

The Imperial Seal has split into three pieces: the Seal of Heaven, the Seal of the People, and the Seal of the Nation. The Seal of Heaven is carried by the old emperor, the Seal of the Nation appears somewhere in the southwest, and the Seal of the People is related to the Imperial City Department.
Auction

Chuxiang City's Dirty Street, Daliang City's Glittering Artifact House, and Zhongzhou's Night Demon Square all hold auctions irregularly. Among them, Dirty Street auctions Throwing, Poison, Glittering Artifact House auctions high-quality gifts, and Night Demon Square auctions scarce Material.
Shifa Temple
"Vairocana Solar Sutra"
The upper and lower volumes of the translated version of the Tathagata Sutra, combined with the original text of the Vairocana Solar Sutra, can yield the true "Vairocana Solar Sutra" Manual.
Yan Yun Iron Army
Xuan He Emperor
Xuan He Emperor is imprisoned in the Palace CampPrison of the Yan Army.
Ye Family Battalion
Recruitment
Ye Family Battalion is recruiting soldiers. Those who are interested in serving the country can sign up at Marshal Ye Pengju.
Southwest region
Dragon's Gallbladder
Ordinary Poison Dragons can mutate into Mutant Poison Dragons through FeedToxic, and the Poison Dragon Gallbladder on their bodies is an important herb for healing special diseases.
